id: Why Trump is spending $6 million on ads that don't mention Trump
paragraph: With one week before midterm elections, Ari Melber breaks down how President Trump and the Republican Party’s spending and battle plan show they are scrambling to protect candidates, even in red districts that overwhelmingly backed Trump in the 2016 election. Melber notes that despite the fact Trump loves to put his name on anything, including buildings and TV screens, he approved $6 million for the 2020 election, on ads that do not mention him.Oct. 30, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
